column1: Little Goat Diner////I came here on a Saturday at about 130pm knowing there would be a wait but was super surprised when told the wait would be an hour. Because they don't take reservations
column2: it can get pretty crazy in there
column3: but let me tell you - well worth the wait! The experience and the food/drinks make this a great place for family
column4: friends and maybe even a weekend date.
